name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in building robust and efficient software solutions. Proficient in **Python**, **Node.js**, and skilled in implementing **PostgreSQL** databases alongside **API** development. Extensive hands-on experience in **CI/CD** automation and container orchestration using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of applications. Adept at email server technologies including **Postfix**, **Dovecot**, and understanding of protocols such as **SMTP**, **IMAP**, and **DNS**, crucial for designing effective email analytics and anti-abuse mechanisms.

Brings a strong foundation in networking, shell scripting, and compliance standards, ensuring adherence to best practices. Known for leading initiatives in developing cloud-native applications and adapting to industry shifts in secure system implementations. Excels in giving practical solutions that enhance user experiences while maintaining system integrity.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable solutions leveraging **Python** and **Node.js** to enhance email analytics and anti-abuse features, ensuring robust communication systems in the healthcare and finance sectors.
• Developed CI/CD pipelines using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, facilitating the deployment of applications across different environments with **99%** reliability.
• Managed PostgreSQL databases for secure and efficient data storage, optimizing queries to process up to **500,000** records in under **2 seconds**.
• Ensured email delivery and security using **Postfix**, **Dovecot**, and established protocols including **SPF**, **DKIM**, and **DMARC**, achieving a **98%** deliverability rate.
• Implemented effective shell scripting solutions to automate system monitoring and maintenance tasks across **Linux** servers, improving operational efficiency by **30%**.
• Engaged in integration of **API** services for enhanced communication between applications, targeting latency reduction to below **100 milliseconds**.
• Contributed to network design and troubleshooting efforts, ensuring reliable interactions across SMTP and IMAP protocols for seamless email services.
• Led documentation and training sessions for team members on best practices in **MTA**, **DNS** configurations, and security tactics related to email distribution and data integrity.

Utilized **Python** and **Node.js** to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms, implementing a microservices-based architecture which improved scalability and maintainability for high-volume transaction systems.
Developed robust APIs and communication protocols, ensuring secure and efficient data exchange based on **PostgreSQL** and integrated with various systems following **CI/CD** practices for seamless deployments.
Designed and implemented dynamic front-end applications using **React (18)**, enhancing user engagement and experience for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Executed real-time analytics by integrating **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to monitor financial activities and generate actionable insights effectively.
Established a resilient event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating real-time processing for transactions and alerts.
Developed and managed ETL pipelines through **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, handling both batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from diverse sources.
Implemented email analytics solutions, focusing on anti-abuse measures by leveraging **Postfix**, **Dovecot**, and strong networking protocols (SMTP, IMAP).
Applied AI/ML techniques with **scikit-learn** and **Azure Machine Learning** for fraud detection systems, successfully identifying and flagging suspicious transaction patterns.
Created and maintained machine learning pipelines using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring efficient model inference integrated into backend services for immediate operational decisions.

• Developed robust backend services utilizing **Python** and **Node.js**, ensuring high availability and integration with various **API** endpoints to enhance system connectivity for a large-scale e-commerce platform.
• Streamlined email handling and improved communication protocols using **Postfix**, **Dovecot**, **SMTP**, **IMAP**, and implemented anti-abuse strategies, ensuring reliable delivery and security updates.
• Managed database systems with **PostgreSQL** for efficient data storage and retrieval, optimizing queries to handle over **1M** transactions daily, maintaining performance under high-traffic conditions.
• Employed **Linux** environments for server management, utilizing shell scripting for automation, reducing deployment times by **30%** through CI/CD practices with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**.
• Collaborated on networking tasks and ensured compliance with **SPF**, **DKIM**, and **DMARC** for enhancing email security, protecting users against phishing and spoofing.
• Analyzed email traffic and user interactions with **email analytics** tools, leading to a **15%** increase in engagement through targeted campaigns.
• Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and security measures to protect user data, ensuring **GDPR** compliance for customer interactions across the platform.
• Participated in system design discussions, reinforcing best practices in software development life cycles and enhancing team productivity with a focus on continuous improvement.
